def solve():
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    
    ans = []
    
    import itertools
    
    min_q = None
    
    for pairs in itertools.permutations(range(0,n,2)):
        temp_p = p[:]
        q = []
        
        
        used = [False] * n
        
        
        for i in pairs:
            
            
            first_index = -1
            second_index = -1
            
            for j in range(len(temp_p)):
                if not used[j] :
                    first_index = j
                    break
            
            
            
            second_index = first_index + 1
            
            
            q.extend([temp_p[first_index], temp_p[second_index]])
            
            used[first_index] = True
            used[second_index] = True
            
            
            temp_p = [x for i,x in enumerate(temp_p) if not used[i]]
            
        if min_q is None:
            min_q = q
        elif q < min_q:
            min_q = q

    print(*min_q)
